channel.title: Comments on: New Year’s TurboGears Sprint

item.title: By: Mark Ramm
item.dc:creator: Mark Ramm
item.description:
Wish I could be there, but I've got too many pythonistas in my neck of the world coming to hang out and hack on TurboGears, and I can't leave them all high and dry.
I hope you all can get together, and if you happen to make it to the pub afterward, raise a pint of Guinness for me. ;)
item.content:encoded:
Wish I could be there, but I’ve got too many pythonistas in my neck of the world coming to hang out and hack on TurboGears, and I can’t leave them all high and dry.

I hope you all can get together, and if you happen to make it to the pub afterward, raise a pint of Guinness for me.
